summary: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business by inviting an evil presence into their home, not realizing how dangerous it is.
cast: Annalise Basso|Elizabeth Reaser|Lulu Wilson|Henry Thomas|Parker Mack|Halle Charlton|Alexis G. Zall|Doug Jones|Kate Siegel|Sam Anderson|Chelsea Gonzalez|Lincoln Melcher|Nicholas Keenan|Michael Weaver|Ele Keats|Eve Gordon|Chad Heffelfinger|Nina Mansker|John Prosky|Lin Shaye|Gary Anderson|Sierra Davey
title: Ouija: El origen del mal
